short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily monitor keyword rankings and optimize your site's SEO performance with this user-friendly tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on a journey of discovery with Page Rank Checker, a groundbreaking tool carefully crafted by the experts at Appwrk IT Solutions! 
 Say goodbye to the hard task of counting website rankings by hand, for this clever extension makes it super easy! 
 Imagine yourself searching for keywords and instantly spotting the numbers right next to each result. It's like having a helpful friend by your side, guiding you through the ins and outs of SEO optimization! 
 
Introducing Page Rank Checker, your ultimate Rank Tracker and SEO Ranking Checker, all rolled into one powerful tool. This game-changing Google Rank Tracker and Website Ranking Checker is designed to streamline your SEO efforts like before. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned pro, Page Rank Checker is your go-to solution for monitoring keyword rankings and optimizing your website's performance. 
 
How it Works: 
Download and Enable: Users can download the extension directly from the Google Chrome Web Store. Once downloaded, they simply need to enable it via their extension toolkit. 
Refresh and Discover: After enabling the extension, a quick page refresh is all it takes. Voila! The rankings will seamlessly appear alongside the search results, providing instant insights into website performance. 
 
 Key Highlights
Cross-platform Compatibility: Works seamlessly on all browsers for easy access. 
User-Friendly Interface: Simple design makes it accessible for all, no tech expertise required. 
Time-Saving Automation: Automates rank checking, saving users 50% of their time weekly. 
Goal Tracking: Set and track SEO goals, seeing a 15% increase in goal attainment within three months. 
Efficiency Gains: Users save 15 hours monthly, boosting productivity by 25%. 
Enhanced Accuracy: Ensures 95% accuracy in rank reporting, eliminating errors
